title: Sand
description: Extracted from the rivers and streams bordering and inside our land this product will be applied toward manufacturing building products, buildings construction and road construction.

title: Ballast
description: Produced from the deposits in the Ndara B Community land or sourced from other quarries. The company shall supply Diaspora University Town project and other projects with stones for roads, products manufacturing and building.

title: Marram
description: Produced from the deposits in the Ndara B Community land or sourced from other quarries. The company shall supply Diaspora University Town project and other projects with marram for roads, products manufacturing and building.

title: Hardcore Rocks
description: Produced from the deposits in the Ndara B Community land or sourced from other quarries. The company shall supply Diaspora University Town project and other projects with marram for roads, products manufacturing and building.

title: Timber
description: Produced through planting and harvesting of trees in different areas of the 5,500 acres, the Company will produce and supply timber for building and making furniture.

title: Building Stones
description: Produced from the deposits in the Ndara B Community land or sourced from other quarries. The company shall supply Diaspora University Town project and other projects with building stones for buildings construction.

title: Pavers
description: Manufactured by the company, the pavers shall be supplied to Diaspora University Town project and other projects for construction of buildings, walkways and roads.

title: Terrazzo
description: Produced or sourced from Ndara B comminity land and other deposits. The company shall supply Diaspora University Town projec and other projects ballast for roads, products manufacturing and building

title: Marble
description: Produced or sourced from Ndara B Community land and other deposits. The company shall supply Diaspora University Town project and other projects with marble for building.

title: fencing Poles
description: Manufactured by the company, the fencing poles shall be supplied to Diaspora University Town project and other projects for fencing plots.

title: Concrete Panels
description: Manufactured by the company, the Concrete Panels shall be supplied to Diaspora University Town project and other projects for construction of buildings and fencing walls.

title: Concrete Slabs
description: Manufactured by the company, the Concrete Panels shall be supplied to Diaspora University Town project and other projects for construction of buildings and walking paths.

title: Concrete Columns
description: Manufactured by the company, the Concrete Columns shall be supplied to Diaspora University Town project and other projects for construction of buildings.

title: Concrete Beams
description: Manufactured by the company, the Concrete Beams shall be supplied to Diaspora University Town project and other projects for construction of buildings.

title: Culverts
description: Manufactured by the company, the Culverts shall be supplied to Diaspora University Town project and other projects for construction of stormwater management system.

title: Curbs
description: Manufactured by the company, the curbs shall be supplied to Diaspora University Town project and other projects for construction of roads borders.

title: Retainers
description: Manufactured by the company, the retainers shall be supplied to Diaspora University Town project and other projects for construction of retainer walls for environmental sustainability.

title: Limestone Tiles
description: Manufactured by the company, the tiles shall be supplied to Diaspora University Town project and other projects for construction of floors, walls and other areas.
